Hi,

 

I am looking for someone experienced with Unity and Blender to give me a few suggestions to an issue I am having with my animations breaking when imported to Unity.

This help will result in a new mod. Credit will be given for the help given.

Thanks

Are you using the stock ModuleAnimateGeneric?

If so you don't need to worry about any plug-in or code and you'd probably get a better answer in the modelling sub-forum.

Especially as you talk about them breaking when importing to Unity, that has nothing to do with KSP or plug-ins for it. It is the import from your modelling program (Blender?) into Unity that is the issue.

(I can't actually help with your issue, I don't know modelling, only plug-ins.)

D.

Thanks, I will start a thread over there. The issue is import from Blender to Unity (as far as I can tell) I am pretty new to thing so it could be there is an aspect to my modelling that is causing the issue.

Appreciate your input.
